spec_data.Name: rubygem-formtastic
spec_data.Description:
Formtastic is a Rails FormBuilder DSL (with some other goodies) to make it far
easier to create beautiful, semantically rich, syntactically awesome, readily
stylable and wonderfully accessible HTML forms in your Rails applications.
spec_data.Signature: RSA/SHA256, Thu 27 Jul 2017 04:35:56 PM EDT, Key ID f55e7430f5282ee4
spec_data.Summary: A Rails form builder plugin with semantically rich and accessible markup
